thehero.aboutmedesc: Im a web developer in search of an oportunity to perfect my programming skills and contribute work in a team. I'm open to work as a frontend, backend or fullstack developer

theexperience.title: Experience & Studies
theexperience.description: These are my working experiences and my studies

theprojects.title: Projects
theprojects.description: These are some of my projects. If you want to see more about them you can click the 'see more' button or click one of the icons on the top side

thecertifications.title: Certifications

theabout.title: About me
theabout.description: Here you can find out more about me.
theabout.paragraph:
I'm a web developer based in Spain, originally from Bulgaria.
My journey began at 15 when I switched to Linux from Windows and fell in love with technology. Since then, I've pursued a career in web development and currently work with frontend frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular, as well as backend technologies like Spring Boot.
Outside of work, I enjoy going to the gym, riding motorcycles, playing games, and going out with friends.
I'm always eager to learn new tools or refine my existing skills.
Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect or collaborate!
